commit.message:
tree.c (tree_code_counts): New global array.

2011-05-02  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree.c (tree_code_counts): New global array.
	(record_node_allocation_statistics): Count individual tree codes.
	(dump_tree_statistics): Dump individual code stats.

From-SVN: r173244

+	(dump_tree_statistics): Dump individual code stats.
